_sText: de_motel_b4 has been released! ------ Third Version of de_motel, once a cs_map. It turned out that most of the time the bombb was planted at A and not at B. I tried to make bomb spot B more interesting and gave more options to approach it: I added -truck added for more cover -stairs from the floor of Cafe Baltic to B -ladder at one of the trucks, you can use to get to the roof of B -a second ladder to the quadratic roof -ladder at the staircase to the roof -moved van, so you can get through at bove sides Further changes: -created a real pool at A. Players can stand in the water. Bomb can be planted underwater. By ducking you may try to hide underwater. -created a hole in the red roof -used playerclip to avoid that players get stuck -many optimizations (changing passable appartments, so you can't look through; removed the most unnecessary appartments) -few details added. -includes 2*64 spawnpoints
